author: wrowe
msg: This rather nice little validation for potentially nasty characters
or empty values of the ServerName, DomainName or AdminEmail fields
successfully validates the data, but these problems remain:
1. The corrected field doesn't display the new value (trimmed white
space or truncated string at the invalid character.)  Until the
user moves off and back onto the dialog they won't see the change.
